trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_CARDGAME_000_000<tab>Triple Triad is taking Eorzea by storm! Care to try your hand at this entrancing new card game?
TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_Q1_000_000<tab>Try your hand at Triple Triad?
TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_CARDGAME_000_010<tab>Are you sure? It's easy to begin, and challenging to master! Well, another time, perhaps!

TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>And so another challenger is born! Welcome to the world of Triple Triad, where you pit your cards against an opponent's in a tense battle of skill, strategy...and the odd dose of luck!
TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_CARDGAME_000_021<tab>Here at the Manderville Gold Saucer, I am pleased to present all new players with the cards they need to get started!
TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_CARDGAME_000_022<tab>To play a match, however, first you'll need to build a deck composed of five cards from your registered card list.
TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_CARDGAME_000_023<tab>Oh, and I suggest speaking with the nearby Triple Triad trader should you wish to expand your card collection!

TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>You are now able to challenge opponents to Triple Triad matches. New cards can be obtained from a number of sources, including the Triple Triad trader, victory spoils from winning matches, and prizes from Triple Triad tournaments.
TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>Play against the Triple Triad master to learn the basic rules of the game. Before you can begin, however, there are several steps that must be completed.

TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>First, you must <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Use<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> the cards in your inventory to register them to your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Card List<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Your card list can be viewed via the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gold Saucer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> options found under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.

TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>Next, access your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Card Decks<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, also located within the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gold Saucer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> options, and build a deck by selecting five cards from those you have registered.
TEXT_SUBGSC102_00437_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>Speak with the Triple Triad master once your deck is ready, and she will engage you in a tutorial match.
